content: here s my pattern for a zelda inspired drawstring bag use it for dice use it as a gift bag use it to keep your crochet bits in it s entirely up to you i wanted to create a really simple example of tapestry crochet that still looked worth its weight in rupees the pattern works using blo back loops only single_crochet stitches for the main body fairly simple colourwork using only two colours and a basic geometric pattern worked from a chart materials sports weight yarn yellow and green 3 5mm crochet hook stitch markers yarn needle stitch knowledge chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip st = slip_stitch ** = a repeating stitch pattern
